alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson County through 515 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marianna, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marianna, Grand Ridge, Greenwood, Blue Spring, Union City, Sink Creek, Dellwood, Star, Simsville, Cypress, Alliance, Chipola Terrace and Marianna Municipal A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
